comment:
You are first one that  strike my mind whenever I think of IIT I. one who seen my complete short temper and still there with me every single time I need. 
Thanks for bearing me and motivating me. I feel blessed to have you.
name: Jai Abhiram Bellamkonda

comment: Sister from another mother.One of the best bonds that I had in iit.I always remember our beautiful days in IIT.you are such a pure and innocent soul that makes everyone to talk with you.Just believe in yourself ra pavani.Never let situations down you.Hope you reach great in your life.Best of luck ra
name: praveen kumar kairamkonda

comment:
Paaaaaaavniiii
Never seen anyone this talktive and active. Such a immense talent but in doing backchodi 💀
Cheers to all the gossiping nights we had. Keep me updated😁😁 
Lokam antha em ayipoyina parle movierulz Inka ibomma mathram mukyam.
Never lose ur confidence ra I'm just a call away.
name: Harshitha Budati

comment: Bold lady I have ever seen.Always keeps that josh and makes everyone around her active.The one who made me mentally strong when I really needed that support.Thanks a lot for being there❤️....keep smiling always😁😊💫💫
name: Jhansi Sammeta

comment: Hey pavani, mast hyper untav 😂, andaritho chala baaga kalisipothav. Probably mana pic lekunda ee event ledemo. Nee toh unnapudu asal decent ga undali ane thought kuda radu mottam chillar chillar untam 😎🤣. Mammalni marchipoku msg chestundu 🥲.
name: ASVS Pradeep Reddy

comment:
Nee fashion sense ki picholu ayipoyaaru maa team vaalu antha😂 
Nee first text maatram marchiponu raaa🙂 kaani campus vachinaaka you were the most sweet girl😉
name: K Sneha

comment: Naaku devudichina akka!!! Anni pics theepinchukoni okka pic credit kuda ivvaledu, ok it's fine. Pure soul, great personality. Konchem aa Kullu jokulu aapeyi. Hope you reach you goals. Itlu nee devudichina thammudu
name: Yelagandula Rohan Sai

comment: Your friendship has truly meant the world to me, and I am incredibly grateful for all the days brightened by your presence. Here's to the countless moments we've cherished together and the enduring bond we share. Wishing you all the best in your future endeavors. Thank you for being a best senior...
name: Dadireddy Navya

comment: Such a positive vibrant girl.Naaku eppudu mood off lo unna  neetho okka proper conversation unte chalu mood set ayipothundhi theliyakunda.Ofcourse nee jokes & punchlines chala miss avuthanu.Always be happy and mana bond mayuri nunchi ikkada ela aithe continue ayyindho alane continue avvalani hoping.
name: Nelavalli Sri Nikhitha

comment: Naa jokes aa bagundavu ante nuvu na kanna worst jokes vesthavu but I'll miss that decomposed jokes. Asalu nuvvu mammalni ardhamchesukunatha evaru chesukoru. Aa night walks and discussions about some random topics avi bagundevi. Ni pelliki vachetappudu vaddanam tesukoni osthanu 😅....
name: Prashanth Vankudoth

comment:
Campus lo first parichayam ayina ammayivi nuvve.
Daring and dashing girl🏃.Food vishayamlo attu ittu vuntam kani ....😂,best in all ways .marchipoku touch lo vundu appudappudu maku msg chei.Byee and Tc 🏃🏃.
name: Sreenath Lakkakula

comment: Neetho ekkuva matladakapoina I always felt some sort of connection frnd! Ilane straight forward ga ichhipadesthu undu🫶🏻!
name: Divya Dedeepya Ankam

comment: Hi.. Probably you are the only girl in IIT Indore I spoke to 🙂. Anyway it was good experience doing BTP especially those last three days before presentation were really great. Keep smiling, Best wishes for your future endeavours!
name: Avinash Bellamkonda

comment: Thanks for being my personal hairstylist . Gonna miss that scale jada trials !!😂😂.  Timing chuskoni punch, inka nee jokes madhyalo chinna chinna fights🤭...anni miss avtha pavani. Never lose ur originality bro, keep smiling , always keep me updated okayy!!
name: Sarvani Satuluri
